bug.author: anantsachin
bug.summary: Webgl build error in Unity 2020.2.0a21 alpha
bug.description:
Describe the bug In Unity 2020.2.0a21 if you build Webgl project it will not play in your browser. *Steps to Aviod the bug Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to 'player setting in project setting' Change compression format from 'Gzip' or 'brotli' to 'disabled' Build your project. 4.It will work succesfully

comments.comment: Hi is this related to ml-agents or is this just a Unity bug? I see <denchmark-link:https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/linux-editor-empty-webgl-project-fails-building?_ga=2.56422444.601106834.1601925801-1907819386.1597705242>https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/linux-editor-empty-webgl-project-fails-building?_ga=2.56422444.601106834.1601925801-1907819386.1597705242</denchmark-link> for this alpha version.
Hi, Its an bug for unity alpha.
